BackstoryDef.title: frontier orphan
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lost [PAWN_possessive] parents to raiders at a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] was taken in by the NCR Rangers, who became [PAWN_possessive] new family.

BackstoryDef.title: legendary Ranger chief
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] became a legendary NCR Ranger, serving with distinction for decades. As Ranger Chief, [PAWN_pronoun] led the defense of Hoover Dam during the First Battle, but grew disillusioned with the endless war.

BackstoryDef.title: border town kid
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a town on the edge of NCR territory, seeing Rangers as heroes who protected the frontier. [PAWN_pronoun] aspired to join their ranks.

BackstoryDef.title: scout's daughter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] learned wilderness survival and stealth from [PAWN_possessive] parents, who worked as scouts for NCR caravans. [PAWN_pronoun] could move unseen even as a child.

BackstoryDef.title: Ranger's son
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised by a Ranger father, learning combat skills and ranger tactics from childhood. Following in those footsteps was never a question.

BackstoryDef.title: outpost kid
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up at remote NCR outposts, watching Rangers come and go. [PAWN_pronoun] learned that Rangers were the Republic's elite.

BackstoryDef.title: trader's daughter
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] traveled with [PAWN_possessive] merchant parents, learning to read people and handle dangerous situations. Rangers often provided escort for their caravans.

BackstoryDef.title: farm defender
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] helped defend [PAWN_possessive] family farm from raiders and wildlife, developing the skills that would later serve [PAWN_objective] as a Ranger.

BackstoryDef.title: military academy student
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] attended an NCR military academy, where [PAWN_pronoun] excelled in marksmanship and tactics. Rangers recruited the best graduates.

BackstoryDef.title: wasteland wanderer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up traveling the wasteland, learning self-reliance and survival. [PAWN_pronoun] saw the NCR Rangers as the ultimate wasteland survivors.

BackstoryDef.title: veteran's son
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised by an NCR veteran who taught [PAWN_objective] combat skills and respect for those who serve. Becoming a Ranger was the ultimate honor.

BackstoryDef.title: Ranger comm officer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a Ranger communications officer, coordinating operations across the Mojave and ensuring Rangers stayed in contact with command.

BackstoryDef.title: stealth Ranger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] became known among the Rangers for [PAWN_possessive] exceptional stealth abilities, earning the callsign "Ghost." [PAWN_pronoun] specialized in reconnaissance missions.

BackstoryDef.title: veteran Ranger officer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] followed [PAWN_possessive] father's path to become a Ranger communications officer, serving with distinction and coordinating critical operations.

BackstoryDef.title: Mojave Outpost Ranger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was stationed at the vital Mojave Outpost, serving as one of the Rangers responsible for monitoring the Long 15 and protecting NCR supply lines.

BackstoryDef.title: Ranger intelligence officer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] specialized in intelligence gathering and analysis for the Rangers, using [PAWN_possessive] social skills to extract information and coordinate operations.

BackstoryDef.title: Ranger station commander
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] commanded a Ranger station in the Mojave, coordinating patrols and managing communications between remote outposts and NCR command.

BackstoryDef.title: tactical Ranger officer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a Ranger communications officer with a focus on tactical operations, planning and coordinating strikes against the NCR's enemies.

BackstoryDef.title: veteran Ranger scout
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a Ranger scout and communications officer, coordinating long-range patrols and providing critical intelligence on enemy movements.

BackstoryDef.title: patrol Ranger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a patrol Ranger, wearing the distinctive patrol armor while scouting dangerous territories and engaging hostile forces in the Mojave.
